subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: When it was announced in 1999 at a Formula 3000 race that Nick Heidfeld would join Formula One the next season, his future appeared set. But years of disappointment followed.
snippet: When it was announced in 1999 at a Formula 3000 race that Nick Heidfeld would join Formula One the next season, his future appeared set. But years of disappointment followed.
